admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project is designed to
            assist the government in intensifying petroleum and
            geothermal exploration activities by supporting its efforts
            to attract foreign oil companies and providing assistance
            for strengthening project implementation capabilities in the
            petroleum exploration subsector. It includes: (i) geological
            and geophysical services; (ii) promotion services to attract
            foreign investors; (iii) technical assistance for training
            the staff of Yemen Oil and Mineral Resources Corporation;
            and (iv) refinancing of the IDA project preparation advance
            which was extended for undertaking a feasibility study for
            the installation of an economically viable system of supply,
            storage and transportation of petroleum products.
